headline: Does First Solar's (FSLR) Flat 2026 Outlook Undercut Its Policy-Supported Growth Story?
summary: In late February 2026, First Solar reported higher fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 results, with sales rising to US$1,682.78 million and US$5,219.38 million respectively, and net income increasing to US$520.88 million for the quarter and US$1,528.23 million for the year, alongside modestly higher earnings per share. At the same time, management issued 2026 guidance calling for flat-to-slightly-lower net sales of US$4.9 billion to US$5.2 billion and announced a new US$1.50 billion unsecured...
